price: 98. Mpe kumisa Nkolo wayo, mpe zala o kati ya bagumbami.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
